reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is a global VOPE community actively contributing to enabling environments for evaluation at national levels in line with the Global Evaluation Agenda 2016?2020. Specific objectives include (I) VOPEs are more influential and able to play strategic roles to strengthen an enabling environment for evaluation within their countries. (II) Stronger VOPEs that are actively working with multi stakeholder new networks towards achieving GlobalEvaluation Agenda priorities. (III) Str engthened individual capacities of evaluators to conduct credible and useful evaluations. (IV) Improved social marketing and network communications. The main strategies for achieving these objectives are implementation of Peer?to?Peer fourth round (P2P4) a nd Innovation Challenge Programme Launch of four new networks and supporting their activities (for Youth Gender + SDGs Parliamentarians) Organizing the Third Collaborative Global Forum in the second half of 2017 and Social Marketing and Network Communicati on.
